definition: A term used to describe the reputation or public perception of an individual or entity, often reflecting their character, achievements, or standing within a community. It is commonly used to refer to the overall opinion or image that someone or something has acquired over time.

examples.german: Der Ruf des Vogels war laut.
Sie hat einen guten Ruf als Schauspielerin.
examples.english: She has a good reputation as an actress.

examples.german: Sein Ruf als Experte ist unbestritten.
examples.english: His reputation as an expert is undisputed.
